tool_description: Retrieve random out-of-context text and images from WikiHow articles
name: WikiHow
title: WikiHow

api_list.name: Steps
api_list.description: Gets a random selection of WikiHow steps.

required_parameters.name: count
required_parameters.description: The number of step strings to retrieve (maximum 100)

api_list.name: Images
api_list.description: Gets the src URL for random WikiHow images

required_parameters.name: count
required_parameters.description: The number of image URLs to retrieve (maximum 100)
